item.description:
This is the second night of the Hartford International Film Festival. (In Spanish w/subtitles)

Director: Pedro Gonz√°lez-Rubio Mexico, 2009 | 73 min. Jorge has only a few weeks with his five-year- old son Natan before he leaves to live with his mother in Rome. Intent on teaching Natan about their Mayan heritage, Jorge takes him to the pristine Chinchorro reef, and eases him into the rhythms of a fishermans life. As the bond between father and son grows stronger, Natan learns to live in harmony with life above and below the surface of the sea.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: HIFF - Alamar
